'''Otogi Countryside Street Lamp''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Otogi Countryside Street Lamp is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] on [[Tsurumi Island]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a [[Remarkable Chest]] northeast of the Teleport Waypoint in [[Moshiri Ceremonial Site]] on Tsurumi Island.
